byline.contributor: Bhadra Sharma reported from Kathmandu and Nida Najar reported from New Delhi
byline.original: By BHADRA SHARMA and NIDA NAJAR

abstract: Helicopter chartered by Doctors Without Borders crashes northeast of Kathmandu, Nepal, killing four people on board; flight was relief mission in wake of April 25 earthquake.
lead_paragraph: The helicopter, which was chartered by Doctors Without Borders, crashed northeast of Kathmandu.

headline.main: Aid Helicopter Crashes in Nepal, Killing 4
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Nepal: 4 Die as Aid Helicopter Crashes

snippet: The helicopter, which was chartered by Doctors Without Borders, crashed northeast of Kathmandu.
